titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning the East-India trade shewing it to be unprofitable to the kingdom of England : being taken out of a essay on trade / written by Mr. John Cary ...
titleStmt.author: Cary, John, d. 1720?

notesStmt.note: Extracted from "An essay on the state of England in relation to its trade, its poor, and its taxes, for carrying on the present war against France".
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
